location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 18/55 III (B Series 18/4) Bahrain Order in Council'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use starts at the front cover and continues to the back cover. The foliation sequence appears in pencil, circled, in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio.

mods.abstract: Notices of King's Regulations made by the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf under Article 70 (C) of the Bahrain Order in Council, 1913(His Majesty's Stationery Office, 1913): The Christian Marriage (Amendment) Regulation 1947, signed and dated 30 July 1947; and The Christian Marriage (Amendment) Regulation, 1948, signed and dated 21 April 1948.
